A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like:
My first time with TLJ was a divisive experience. A lot felt out of place and there was too much going on. Gave me mixed feelings. I saw it a second time yesterday... and it was great! Sure\, it has some flaws and too many jokes\, but the movie as a whole just blew me away. The stakes are super high\, it's unpredictable and heartfelt. There are so many moments that made me happy or burst in tears\, that I can forget about the bits I didn't like. No Star Wars is flawless\, so i made my peace with it and enjoyed it SO MUCH.

New additions to the universe are always tricky business to me\, because I hold it so very dear. Falling in love with them is always a process\, so I think it will grow even more. 

Right now I like TFA a little better\, but who knows. Here's my ranking of all SW movies from worst to best:

attack of the clones 
revenge of the sith 
the phantom menace 
rogue one 
a new hope (it's so old)
the last jedi 
the force awakens 
the empire strikes back/return of the jedi (can't decide)
